title: Empirical formula by micro-analysis
creator_credit: Jack Smith and Granada Television International
brief_description: Shows procedures necessary to determine the empirical formula of a substance. Amounts of carbon, hydrogen and nitrogen are determined by estimating the weight of CO2, H2O and NH3 produced by the unknown. Students are expected to record the data and use it to ascertain the formula. Suitable for upper secondary level.
